password_reset_email_sent: Password reset instructions have been shipped to yer inbox if there be an account associated with it!

passwords.throttled: You have been temporarily throttled due to too many password change attempts, please try again later.
passwords.token: Invalid token associated with the password request, please try requesting a new password reset link.
passwords.user: Can't reset password for an invalid user!
passwords.confirmation: The provided password and password confirmation ain't a matchin'.

invalid_user: The credentials provided do not match them which we have on record! If you're not sure that your password is correct, try resetting it!
sso_down: Unable to contact the servers to verify the account, please try again later.
sso_failed: Something went wrong when tryin' to verify the account! Please try again later!
sso_invalid: The previous session expired, please try again!
sso_non_existing_account: Can nah find an associated account on the panel. Please use the normal login and enable quick login from the account settings!
sso_disabled_for_account: This account has quick login disabled! Please use the normal login instead!
